Are you an oncall engineer looking to enhance your incident resolution process and maintain a comprehensive record of your actions? Look no further than RedScope, the essential Chrome plugin designed exclusively for oncall engineers.

Key Features:

1. Recording All DOM Mutations: RedScope diligently captures every DOM mutation, ensuring a detailed account of your interactions with web applications.

2. Tracking Visited URLs: Keep track of the websites and URLs visited during your troubleshooting sessions, providing valuable context for issue resolution.

3. Seamless Integration: The plugin seamlessly integrates with an accompanying Electron app that runs locally on your laptop, allowing you to save and manage your data securely.

4. Local Data Storage: Rest easy knowing that all the data collected is stored locally on your laptop until you choose to publish it. Your sensitive information stays under your control.

Why RedScope?

Solving complex technical issues requires more than just technical know-how; it demands a system of record.  It helps to learn on how oncall engineers before you have solved the same issues
 RedScope,ai, in tandem with the Electron app, empowers you to build a comprehensive history of your actions, ensuring accountability and facilitating knowledge sharing among your team.
Empower your oncall engineering team with RedScope and unlock a new level of efficiency and accountability. Download the plugin today and take control of your incident resolution process.
